name: Tasin Islam Wasi
title: Embedded Systems Engineer & Web Developer
summary: Passionate Electrical and Electronics Engineer with expertise in Embedded Systems, IoT, Web & Software Development. Dedicated to creating innovative and efficient technology solutions.

details: Assisted in troubleshooting, repairing, and maintaining electrical and electronic systems
Developed and tested embedded controllers for automation and power management
Performed circuit diagnostics, PCB analysis, and equipment calibration
Prepared technical documentation and performance reports
Installed and configured industrial devices such as elevators and generators
Coordinated projects and ensured timely equipment setup

projects.name: Smart Poultry Farm Monitoring System
projects.description: IoT device for 24 7 farm surveillance. Senses ammonia and toxic gases, temperature, and includes vision monitoring. Enables remote control of pumps, lighting, and fans. Streams real time data to mobile for decision making.

projects.name: Soap Manufacturing Automation Unit
projects.description: Automated miniature soap factory with dispensing, conveying, and processing stages. Uses hoppers, sensors, motor drivers, and labeled control wiring to show an industrial automation pipeline.

projects.name: Smart Traffic Management System Using Piezo Electric
projects.description: Piezoelectric sensors embedded in road surface detect pressure and vibration. Arduino processes signals to optimize traffic light timing. System harvests energy from sensors for self sustaining operation.

projects.name: Energy Harvesting from Footsteps
projects.description: Piezoelectric tiles generate energy from footsteps and store it in batteries for low power devices and urban infrastructure.

projects.name: Smart Traffic Light Control System
projects.description: Sensor driven system that adapts traffic light cycles based on real time vehicle density to reduce congestion and energy usage.

projects.name: IoT Based Weather Monitoring System
projects.description: Sensors capture temperature, humidity, and pressure. Data is sent to a cloud platform for real time analysis and access.

projects.name: Solar Powered Smart Irrigation System
projects.description: Soil moisture sensors automate irrigation, powered by solar energy for sustainable agriculture.
